ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope.  I used a PGT for many levels and CoB stacks just fine with Berserker Strength. Kitasi ... From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@eskimo.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Nope. I used a PGT for many levels and CoB stacks just fine with Berserker
Strength.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 03, 2000 1:17 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems


>That was my problem as well. A good enchanter makes many of our tactics
>unusable. I finally stuck on using hymn, warsong, and CoB after making it
>clear the enchanter should not buff people with Strengthen. When
>our ranger wasn't there I used Chains in place of CoB.

Here is a reason it might be sticking inconsistently -- Berserker Strength.
I don't cast Strengthen on my tanks anymore because Berserker Strength
overwrites
it anyway. Berserker Strength is a lvl 20 spell that repeats the prov of the
PGTomahawk (The thing you get in High Hold) with a decrease in agility,
increase
in Strength and small Rune affect (And no reagant needed)

If someone was using a PGT/The Enchanter was casting that on the person
being
hit upon, this could be why it was working inconsistently. It worked
when Berserker Strength wasn't up. Didn't work otherwise.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 21 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
<lvl 6 paladin -- baby BASHer!>

>As for stacking, if CoB was up Strengthen would stick and CoB would still
>work, but CoB would not stick after Strengthen. Also, The Screaming Mace
>effect will not stick if you are singing CoB, but if Screaming Mace effect
>goes off first, CoB will stack on top of it. Weird huh?
>
> Kit
